title: Animals
overview: Shikamori Umi is a 27 year old TV program AD working at a exploitative TV production company. She is so occupied with daily work that she forgets about her dreams and love life, turning into a "worn-out woman who is unable of finding happiness". When she visits Animal Beauty, a cosmetic company for an interview, Umi got to know Nagamine Kazao a young photographer and Sakaki Keisuke a CEO who doesn't know how to love. This encounter has brought upon a chance for her to switch jobs, at this new workplace will she be able to transform into a better version of herself?
